description: This file contains Polymer framework features, including template preparation, DOM manipulation, custom element registration, and shadow DOM distribution logic, primarily for Polymer mini components.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi
classes.description: Provides DOM manipulation and observation APIs, including node insertion, removal, cloning, and event handling, with support for Shadow DOM and Shady DOM.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi.ClassList
classes.description: Wrapper for classList property, allowing class manipulation with automatic distribution updates.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi.EffectiveNodesObserver
classes.description: Observes effective DOM nodes, including content and distributed nodes, with support for Shadow DOM mutation observation.

classes.name: Polymer.DomApi.DistributedNodesObserver
classes.description: Specialized observer for distributed nodes in Shadow DOM, extending EffectiveNodesObserver.

methods.name: _prepTemplate
methods.description: Prepares the template for the component, importing and decorating it.

methods.name: _stampTemplate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the component's template.

methods.name: instanceTemplate
methods.description: Returns a cloned DOM node from the template content.

methods.name: flush
methods.description: Flushes pending DOM operations and debouncers.
